The final Fortran code would be:

program main

   implicit none

   integer :: x_input, res1, second_output, X

   ! First step

   read(*,*) x_input if (x_input ==1) then

      res1 =0

   else

      res1 =1

   end if

   ! Second step

   character(len=1) :: char_str

   char_str = char(ichar('0') + res1)

   integer, parameter :: MOD = 1000000007

   integer :: dp(0:0, 0:12) = 0

   integer :: base =1

   integer :: i, pre, next_digit, new_mod

   character(len=1) :: current_char

   current_char = char_str

   do i =0, 0

      current_char = char_str(1:1)

      if (current_char == '?') then

         do pre =0, 12

            do next_digit =0,9

               new_mod = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 )

               if (i ==0) then

                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + merge(1,0, pre ==0)

               else

                  dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)

               end if

               dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)

            end do

         end do

      else

         next_digit = ichar(current_char) - ichar('0')

         do pre =0,12

            new_mod = mod( base * next_digit + pre, 13 ) if (i ==0) then

               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + merge(1,0, pre ==0)

            else

               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)

            end if

            dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)

         end do

      end if

      base = mod( base *10, 13 )

   end do

   second_output = dp(0,5)

   ! Third step

   X = second_output

   if (X /=2 .and. mod(X,2) ==0) then

      X = X +1

   end if

   do

      integer :: sqrt_x = nint(sqrt(real(X))) logical :: found = .false. do i=3, sqrt_x, 2

         if (mod(X,i) ==0) then

            found = .true.

      end do

      if (.not. found) then

         exit

      else

program main

            else

               dp(i, new_mod) = dp(i, new_mod) + dp(i-1, pre)

            end if

            dp(i, new_mod) = mod(dp(i, new_mod), MOD)

         end do

      end if

      base = mod( base *10, 13 )

   end do

   second_output = dp(0,5)

      X = X +1

            exit

      end do

      if (is_prime) then

      else

         X = X +2

      end if

   end do

   write(*,*) X

end program main
